title: Spiced carrot porridge

ingredients.content: ½ lemon, juice and finely grated zest, no white pith
60 g walnuts, plus extra for garnishing
280 g carrots, cut into pieces (4 cm)
40 g pure maple syrup, plus extra to serve

preparations.content: <b>Insert butterfly whisk<b>. Place crème fraîche into mixing bowl and beat <b>1 min/speed 4<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.

Add yoghurt, lemon juice and zest and blend <b>40 sec/speed 2<b>. <b>Remove butterfly whisk<b>. Transfer into a sealable storage container, then place into refrigerator until ready to use. Clean and dry mixing bowl.
Place walnuts into mixing bowl and chop <b>2 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer into a bowl and set aside.
Place carrots into mixing bowl and chop <b>4 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and repeat chopping <b>4 sec/speed 5<b> if necessary to create small diced pieces.
Add all remaining ingredients, including reserved chopped walnuts, and cook <b>15 min/90°C//speed 2<b>.
Serve porridge immediately with reserved topping, walnuts and a drizzle of maple syrup.

hintsAndTricks: You can substitute milk with any nut milk of choice.
You can replace the raisins with dried apricots or dates, and replace walnuts with pecans or pistachios.
